programme.title: US/USSR handshakes, 1975
programme.short_synopsis: Russian-American handshakes in space, and the denunciations of Alexander Solzhenitsyn.
programme.medium_synopsis: American and Soviet astronauts Thomas Stafford and Alexei Leonov's symbolic handshake, and Alexander Solzhenitsyn's untimely intervention about the realities of the USSR.
